001package imagingbook.common.util;
002
003import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.util.zip.DataFormatException;
006import java.util.zip.Deflater;
007import java.util.zip.Inflater;
008
009/**
010 * This class provides ZIP-compression/decompression of byte arrays.
011 * 
012 * @author WB
013 * @version 2022/09/06
014 */
015public class ZipCompressor {
016
017        private final boolean nowrap;   // true -> ZLIB header and checksum fields will not be used
018        private final int bufsize;
019        
020        public ZipCompressor(int bufsize, boolean nowrap) {
021                this.bufsize = bufsize;
022                this.nowrap = nowrap;
023        }
024
025        public ZipCompressor() {
026                this(1024, true);
027        }
028        
029        // -----------------------------------------------------------
030                        
031        public byte[] compressByteArray(byte[] inputBytes){
032                Deflater deflater = new Deflater(Deflater.BEST_COMPRESSION, nowrap);
033                deflater.setInput(inputBytes);
034                deflater.finish();
035
036                final byte[] buf = new byte[bufsize];
037                byte[] outputBytes = null;
038
039                try (ByteArrayOutputStream bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream()) {
040                        while (!deflater.finished()) {
041                                int size = deflater.deflate(buf);
042                                bos.write(buf, 0, size);
043                        }
044                        outputBytes = bos.toByteArray();
045                } catch (IOException e) { }
046
047                return outputBytes;
048        }
049
050        public byte[] decompressByteArray(byte[] inputBytes){
051                Inflater inflater = new Inflater(nowrap);
052                inflater.setInput(inputBytes);
053
054                final byte[] buf = new byte[bufsize];
055                byte[] outputBytes = null;
056
057                try (ByteArrayOutputStream bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream()) {
058                        while(!inflater.finished()){
059                                int size = inflater.inflate(buf);
060                                bos.write(buf, 0, size);
061                        }
062                        outputBytes = bos.toByteArray();
063                } catch (IOException | DataFormatException e) { } 
064
065                return outputBytes;
066        }
067        
068}
